page.title: 15Local Government-Guisborough
page.content: The town's pop.of 20000 is increasing as dormitory for Teesside 10 m.away. 3 local govt.tiers affect Guisb: the parish;Langbaurgh DC;Cleveland CC.Our amenity survey went to parents of stu- dents at the 6th form college; 50 forms were returned.Only 37 could name their MP (Holt) & only 12 their Euro- MP (Vanneck),many misspelling the latter.Of their local contribution most felt they'd done little.They were said to be'noticeable by their abs- ence'.On 2.5.85,C.Council elections were held.28 voted,with 15 voting for local issues;18 on national. About the town,there was much dissatisf.with local amenits.(see next page). It was felt the town had expanded enough: 46 said No more.Of course our survey wasn't a cross section; parents of 6th formers are not typical; nor are form fillers,of those who cant be bothered.
